name: Aski's Temporal Tangle
description:
if you don't know how to solve the room with fake floors look below on SPOILER currently the final boss cant be killed under certain circumstances (you can try attacking it from different sides and it might work) to reach the end, we are aware of this issue and will fix it as soon as the judging period of DCJAM2023 ends. First-person dungeon crawler for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023. DUALITY THEME: Two dimensions that are connected to each other through time portals. CONTROLS: Movement: WSAD, Q,E for turning Inventory: I Pause : ESC Everything else is mouse controlled so do not hesitate to click on everything you see. AUTHORS: Janda - Lead programmer, artist turtledave501 - Lead artist, programmer SFX: Soundly, Pixabay BUG REPORTING: if you find any bugs, please report it here PS: you can also find all of the known bugs there SPOILER : Open this if you don't know how to solve the room with fake floors

it is a caesar cipher find it on the internet, you can get a riddle explaining how to solve it in the time realm with blue-ish walls hidden on the wall. But the solution is : 

SPOILER : actual solution to it (open if you are too lazy to solve the riddle)

up - x

down - g

left - o

right - u

xxuuuuxxoxoogooogggooxxxxuxuuuxuuxxooxxuxxx
